original_title: Lost Cave Temples of the Himalaya
overview: In a remote corner of the Himalaya, in the forbidden Kingdom of Mustang, mysterious caves, perched high on cliff faces and carved by humans thousands of years ago, have lain just beyond reach â€” until recently. In April of 2007, a team of climbers and scientists climbed inside the long-hidden chambers for the first time in modern history.
title: Lost Cave Temples of the Himalaya
